item.title: Can we nominate people for badges?
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

[quote=“Newty, post:110, topic:547169”][quote author=Ruby link=topic=666072.msg4470879#msg4470879 date=1422844656]

“Can u code? :D”

“I helped develop AutoRune”

“but pls help wher can i find RunServer.bat ”

“RunServer.bat”? You mean RuneSever.org?

If they would all go there it would make this place a much more enjoyable forum. It’s a shame the vet boards aren’t used more often

yea then it will be even more dead excellent idea Ruby here I thought we were mates guess not

you’re bound to have realised by now that I don’t have the best thought process ever bruh

Ruby is writing a book on how to be elitist while not being part of the elite, gunna be a really interesting read

why does everyone kick this “elitist” word around? I don’t like idiots, that doesn’t mean I think I’m better than them
[/quote]

Why don’t you like idiots? Why not treat them with the same respect as other people lol. Or at least try…[/quote]
Because generic idiots don’t bother me, I’ve helped hundreds of people who aren’t as knowledgeable in a certain area as I am with no problem because they wanted to learn - in case you’ve not noticed I’m not exactly Einstein myself. It’s the idiots who don’t want to learn or listen are the ones that I don’t treat with respect.

Read full topic
item.source: Can we nominate people for badges?

item.title: Can we nominate people for badges?
item.dc:creator: @classic mopmans little slave
item.description:
@classic wrote:

[quote=“Ruby, post:105, topic:547169”][quote author=Classic link=topic=666072.msg4470761#msg4470761 date=1422780414]

“Can u code? :D”

“I helped develop AutoRune”

“but pls help wher can i find RunServer.bat ”

“RunServer.bat”? You mean RuneSever.org?

If they would all go there it would make this place a much more enjoyable forum. It’s a shame the vet boards aren’t used more often

lol, why are you complaining that a new generation doesn’t know what autorune is, its well over a decade old now and is a part of runescape cheating, not emulation, and i’m also fairly sure you didn’t know what autorune is a few years ago considering you weren’t a part of the scene at that age either so it’s not like you were there

you’re shitting on young people when everyone else is autistic at that age, including me. also, if they left the forums it wouldn’t be very enjoyable considering it would be dead
[/quote]
Just because I wasn’t a part of the “scene” until about 5 years ago doesn’t mean I don’t appreciate what it was in its prime? If people want to get into this “scene” then surely they should learn the ins and outs and AR is a big thing to ignore[/quote]
it really isn’t that big of a deal that people should still think of it relevant now is what my point is, its not something for people who aren’t even working on runescape cheating to be ridiculed for

all i’m saying is that it just looks to me like you’re kind of laughing at them because they’re young and don’t know much, and everyone is young at some point

Read full topic
item.source: Can we nominate people for badges?

you’re shitting on young people when everyone else is autistic at that age, including me. also, if they left the forums it wouldn’t be very enjoyable considering it would be dead[/quote]
